title: Collections for a History of Staffordshire
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Some volumes of this series have distinctive titles.  Before concluding that such a volume is in the public domain, search for book renewals under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual volume titles.
